website_summaries.verdict: Built for 2, this wagon is ideal for siblings or cruising with company. An affordable pull-along cart that has fantastic versatility and durability.
pros: Offers contoured seating for 2 with handy built-in storage underneath
Deep leg and foot wells ensures kids have plenty of legroom
Versatile design can be used for anything from walks and sibling play to outdoor seating for kids or even as an utility wagon
cons: Wheels can be noisy on hard surfaces

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this wagon!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the negative reviews. All I can say is that my DD loves this wagon! She puts her pinecones and balls and (my poor) shih tzu in it and pulls it around the yard. It is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Petula Twinkie

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the money without spending a lot and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I probably should never have gotten this as my 2 year old wont get out and cries for me to pull her around the yard all day long. She loves it I know. Works good for the money without spending a lot and it pulls fairly easily thru trails in the woods. Does require some assembly however, which is a pain, espeically when they are crying to ride it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G

customer_reviews.title: First wagon was damaged
customer_reviews.text: The time I had assembling this wagon with instruction being pictures only. This bolt has to go through 10 holes and if they are not perfectly aligned this attempt can drive you easily mad. I had to get a replacement wagon since the first handle was impossible to attach. Some holes were way off and the is no manipulating them. But...all ended well and I find this wagon to be quite sturdy to hold a 3 and 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong hardware
customer_reviews.text: Wrong hardware. The front wheels do not fit onto the rods because the rods are wrong. In addition, the wheel spacers for the rear axle are the wrong length but still fit. But they are causing the rear wheels to bind when rolling. Obviously they packed the wrong hardware. But it's very frustrating and reflects poorly on the product. Will be asking for a refund and return.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Wagon
customer_reviews.text: Really do like this wagon! We did have an issue with one of the bearing-type pieces breaking off the wheel. I tried contacting Step2 a couple different times to see how much a replacement wheel would cost or how to fix it, but they never replied. That was disappointing, since I normally have had good customer service with them. The wagon still works without it, but maybe not as smoothly. My only other thing is that I wish the wheels were more rubber type material so it wasn't so loud rolling down the street.
customer_reviews.author: relei

customer_reviews.title: Great little wagon, but smaller inside then I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little wagon, but I'm not sure how two toddlers are going to fit inside because it seems on the small side inside. Also, I'm a little concerned about the door latch and little ones getting their fingers pinched, but we will see I haven't put it to the test yet. Also, ours came with some damage that we discovered after it was almost put together. It has a crack in the plastic on the side, not sure if it is worth taking apart and returning or just living with it and hoping for the best!
customer_reviews.author: T.Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our twin 16-month-old daughters for Christmas. So far it has been too cold to use it outside, but they love being walked around the house in it. They fit very well in it with space to spare as they grow. The door is great because they can climb in and out of it on their own. When we aren't pulling them in it, they enjoy getting in and out of it and playing in it. They also like opening and closing the storage compartment. It steers well, both pushing and pulling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Best for Toddler's 1st Wagon
customer_reviews.text: Great Gift for Grandson's 1st Birthday. He loves it. It's held up nicely. He uses the door, and could do it himself when it was new. But now we help him as it doesn't operate quite as smoothly and we don't want him to pinch his fingers. My husband thought he would not use the door, but that's the first thing he wanted to do when he got the wagon. Everyday when his daddy gets home, he takes him in the wagon to get the mail. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Gal

customer_reviews.title: Door Latch no longer functioning
customer_reviews.text: Love the wagon except for the door latch. Purchased it in June 2018 and the latch worked fine the first couple of times we used it. After the most recent use, the latch appears to have gotten out of alignment and will no longer close. My brother looked it over and thinks the metal spring mechanism inside the latch is popping out of place. He tried to realign it but it kept malfunctioning. He did manage to get the door closed and I will just leave it closed. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M.

customer_reviews.title: Recieved a used wagon
customer_reviews.text: We are currently still assembling the wagon. It's pretty much impossible to do unless you've got your own tools. If we hadn't waited almost 2 weeks to recieve this, and our son wasn't so excited about it I would return it. We paid full price for a new wagon but it's obviously used. There is scuffs and scratches all over it and grass inside of it. I don't mind purchasing used, but only when the price is fair.
customer_reviews.author: JROD41

customer_reviews.title: Best Wagon Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. Easily put together. I bought this for my not born grandson to use when he gets older. Just had baby shower and instead of a bag to hold all the presents I put everything I had been buying in this wagon. I have been buying for months. :):) First time Nana Picture shows to the left the wagon, sort of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a tank!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a tank. I did not have a trailer for my lawn mower for awhile and needed to haul some firewood up from the bottom of the yard. I hooked this thing up behind it with a large bolt and piled it full of wood. Ended up using for this through an entire winter. Next summer sprayed it off and used to take kids to parades. It has sat outside for around 4 years now and is still in great condition, not even faded.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Durable wagon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our grandchildren. I think they will really enjoy the wagon. It is sturdy and durable. I like the two cup holders as well. We were unable to put this item together by ourselves. We had a handy man coming in to fix a faucet in our home and asked him to put it together for us. We were so thankful for his expertise.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis McAndrew

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpuse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily because it has straps...which work great & are easily adjustable. So far I've only had one child in at a time. Pros: Sturdy & roomy, my grandson LOVES it; it goes great in grass; the straps or "seat belts" Cons: The handle is somewhat awkward (shape & length); If your child rides in the back (facing the direction you are pulling) you have to watch the weight when you are going up bumps or hills or you will do a "wheely"; lastly, the wheels are plastic & are SUPER loud when pulling on gravel, or a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wagon for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wagon for my two toddlers. We have only gotten to take it out once since it is cold still where I live. However, they both really enjoyed it. I love that it has two seats and cup holders and a space to store their snacks. Snacks are a must have for my children when going for a stroll. This wagon is so nice and will get lots of use for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Desire'

customer_reviews.title: Great Quailty
customer_reviews.text: I received this in 2 days! But about the wagon...it is great! Easy putting it together - took about 15 minutes in all and is made of such good quality workmanship - just like all of the other STEP2 products! My son loves it - this is the second one I have bought (because the price it awesome too), and used the other ones as gifts. The recipients have been just as pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith S.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the seating options, snack cubbie, drink holders and especially the door. He loves having a door his size! I even give him rides just down the driveway to get the mail because he likes it so much :) I couldn't assemble it my mysel...my husband had to use a special tool to get the wheels snapped on.
customer_reviews.author: jamierose

customer_reviews.title: NO instructions in ENGLISH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wagon as a baby shower gift but when it was delivered & I tried to assemble it, found myself "Language" stupid!!! The instruction sheet had only 2 words in English.....Right and Left!!! Thankfully my Hubby arrived in time to figure the assembly out w/o the instructions!!! Once assembled, it was sturdy & fabulous!!
customer_reviews.author: parliegirl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to assemble. Only difficulty was aligning the multiple holes to attach wagon to handle. Took a few tries to line up correctly, but otherwise was a breeze to put together with the required tools (wrench, hammer, screwdriver, and pliers). My two year old loves the wagon. Having the door is a nice feature. Latch for door is too difficult for little hands to lift, which is fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P Lever

customer_reviews.title: No seat
customer_reviews.text: It took me two hours to put this together, not because it’s complex but because it was extremely hard to hammer down. Also I received my product without the seat cover that attaches so now one of my children have to sit on a pillow over the seat area that is supposed to be a storage area without the actual seat. I would return or do an exchange except that is a huge headache and I need this wagon now to walk with my kids to the store. I like the wagon, I’m just upset about the seat not being in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole horn

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: If you are having trouble deciding on which wagon to buy for your kid this is it. This wagon was priced well made well and works great. The only negative is assembly. I had no issues but other people might.
customer_reviews.author: JJRH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My sone loves his wagon. It maneuvers beautifully. My son spends hours just getting in and out, opening and closing the door. He loves the walks also. He buckles in securely.
customer_reviews.author: Julie V

customer_reviews.title: What a great wagon!
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is awesome! It holds my 2 year old and my 1 1/2 year old and a few of their toys and blankets. It is very sturdy. It was so awesome we got another one for their grandparents house! Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria B.

customer_reviews.title: Great little wagon
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is awesome and is easy to put together. Even if you put it together and everything is too tight, it will loosen up after the first use. When using with ne child, it's probably best to ensure they are sitting at the front otherwise it seems easy to tip up. Seatbelts ensure your child is secure if it is slightly tipped however.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Step2 wagon
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to use this wagon for the purpose I bought it(was going to be used for a baby to ride in as a flower girl). It was easy to put together. It is a good quality and easily holds 2 toddlers. It was too large for the baby and too bulky to cover with fabric for the wedding. It is too large to transport in a vehicle comfortably but sturdy for rough terrain.
customer_reviews.author: talkiemama

customer_reviews.title: EZ Rider
customer_reviews.text: We got it for our 2 kids under two and it's working very well. Straps seem sturdy and nobody's fallen out. Now after dinner we hear,"Dada. Walk? Dada walk peas."
customer_reviews.author: Erin & jay

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks sturdy enough. Unfortunately I bought this for my son for Christmas and when I opened the box to put it together on Christmas eve, what do I find? Not a single wheel kit in the box & no seat belts. So I had nothing to even try to put together, with out the kit the wheels won't stay on. And of course it being Christmas eve the customer service was closed even though it was early afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: cfien

customer_reviews.title: 3 & 2 year old LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Playing with the wagon on the grass creates great entertainment. If the wheels were rubber instead of plastic, this wagon would be top notch. My three year old kept asking me to take them off the gravel, because the wagon was too bouncy. It's been a huge hit every day with the three and two year old!
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pain to install
customer_reviews.text: The wagon seems sturdy enough and is pretty maneuverable. However the installation is a pain and doesn’t seem to have been thought out in the design.
customer_reviews.author: Florencio Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought something else
customer_reviews.text: Within first minutes of use the cap covering the wheel hardware snapped off. Pieces of plastic keep peeling off, especially where the door rubs against wagon when opened. It's cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!! Spend the little extra and get a RADIO FLYER!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED!! I bought this May 2016 & I bought it for my Sons, 1st Birthday .he really hasn't gotten 6 months of play out of it..he's only 2 now & is only about 19 pounds ..the plastic by the front wheel is completely cracked that holds the wheel in place. He has only taken rides down the sidewalk & in the grass in our yard. If I don't keep the wagon wheels strait it about tips over. I wouldn't recommend this wagon to anyone spend the little extra and get a Radio Flyer!!
customer_reviews.author: Super-Shopping-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Product shipment quality was a let down.
customer_reviews.text: I love all the features of the wagon. The handle was pretty difficult to attach to the wagon. I'm giving it a 3 stars because the product came dented. Not what I expect from a brand new product. It could have been shipped better too, it was just thrown into a box and everything inside was banging and rattling against each other.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love the Step 2 Brand..Love this Wagon!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wagon.It is small inside space for two infants to toddlers.Cup holders,secure children with straps and small under seat storage.Typical quality for Step2 brand.
customer_reviews.author: T. Russ

customer_reviews.title: For our Autisitc grandson
customer_reviews.text: We got this for his BD but he could not wait, and we left it out and when he saw it Dad had to put it together and let him have it. It is great for his tablet so he can watch George while riding. ha
customer_reviews.author: B. Or D. Beadles

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon, door is tough to open though.
customer_reviews.text: Wagon is great, easy set up. Would have rated 5 instead of 4 but the door is very hard to open. My kids can't open it on their own and I often struggle with it. They just climb out of the sides when using. I would have liked a better functioning door for increased safety purposes.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves riding in his wagon. Easy to assemble and use. I use ours at our camp on dirt, rocky roads and it is still in good shape!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany A.

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were a little troublesome if you don't see exactly where all parts are when assembling the wagon. There is really no written instruction, it is all pictures. If you made a mistake like I did you have to destroy the "securing peg" Not exactly sure of the proper terminology for that device but they give you extras. Just make sure you are awake and alert or you will have3 to call the company for more of those parts like I did. They were really helpful and sent me more those securing parts. The wagon Is sturdy and is a good design, just wish the wheels were rubber instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Adgrand70

customer_reviews.title: Super wagon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wagon for my 2 year old grand daughter. Assembly was simple & she loves it. She enjoys riding as well as filling it with toys to pull around herself. She calls it her car with the seat belts & cup holders. When she outgrows it I’m sure her parents will use it for carrying yard tools & waste
customer_reviews.author: Martha Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Two year old loves uses his wagon for our daily evening walks! Super easy to use, steer, pull - no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon
customer_reviews.text: Great wagon. Kids in for a bumpy ride in gravel. But otherwise it does really good. Very roomy. Drink holders a plus. Would be really awesome with all terrain rubber tires.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Raby

customer_reviews.title: A great vehicle for my boys outdoor adventures
customer_reviews.text: I had just a little trouble putting it together but now me and my two boys use it every day to walk to the park! Absolutely love the cup holders for their water suppies on hot days and the hidden seat compartment where I store small snacks and sun screen. Durable product. I’m happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Sol del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Great little wagon
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon. It is nice and deep so it feels secure for younger children especially with the seat belts. My only complaint it that the latch is kind of awkward and difficult to maneuver -- feels like it could easily pinch you.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M DiSanto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and safe for little ones!! Except on highway.
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is perfect for small kids. Buyer beware: its not road worthy, people honk, it gets ugly! But for sidewalk use or at a tractor pull it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this color
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon and so does my son (except the door is weird and doesn’t close right) but it looks like we bought it secondhand after it sat in someone’s yard for years. The color is awful. Luckily it doesn’t bother my little guy but it bothers me that something we bought new and paid decent money for looks old and crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Holds my 20lb baby and 30lb baby no issue. Has held my 80lb son and 20lb baby at once but wheels didn't like the 80lb son lol. Easy to put together (of course I can say that because my husband done it haha). Comes with 2 seat belts. Big plus...the bottom has to big drain holes so if your 1 yr old decides to wash his wheels (yes he done that today) no flooding!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our grandson's first birthday. Although he's a little young for the recommended age, he loves it. His mom does too, she can put him in with her groceries and make one trip to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value - Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent product. I like how the handle folds for storage. The cup holders, under seat storage and seat belts are nice, too. Docked it one star because the assembly instructions where all pictures with no written instructions. Not hard to assemble by any means - just trying to figure out how to orient pieces using only pictures with no words was time consuming. Made in USA!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The beat wagon ever. Safe,sturdy, can push or pull, 2 seatbelts, a door which keeps them busy for hours opening and closing
customer_reviews.author: J sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in front wheels
customer_reviews.text: I got this wagon on April 9 of this year. Thebtwo front wheels are already bowing out.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Wagon for 2
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wagon for my son for his birthday this summer. Works perfect for at camp house or beach. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old because he’s been wanting one for awhile. Putting it together was intimidating but after awhile I figured it out. I don’t have any other experience putting things like this together. He loves it and it’s still in one piece lol
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and he just loves it. It’s also easy for him to push which he likes to do. Great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Raelyn Gable

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My grandson gets his toys and drink climbs inside and plays for hours
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Donner

customer_reviews.title: I liked the idea of the cup holders and the storage ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wagon for my Grandson and this one caught my eye. Talked to a neighbor of mine and she had gotten two of them. One for each one of her grandchildren. And talking with other friends they had gotten this same wagon also. Some in dif. colors but basically the same. I liked the idea of the cup holders and the storage compartment in it. And thought my son and daughter in law would like the idea of the safety belts. I live in Wisconsin and they live in Atlanta GA. I had it shipped to there house. I'm going there for Thanks Giving and cant wait to pull my Grandson around in his new wagon.
customer_reviews.author: barb palmquist

customer_reviews.title: Future Fun Times with this Step2 Wagon
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable, long lasting toy. It was relatively easy to assemble and easily carries my toddler granddaughter safely. There is storage under the seat. This wagon will need to stay on the porch, that is why I did not purchase an American Flyer. An American Flyer would have rusted, this Step2 will not rust. The handle telescopes for taller persons who are pulling. I certainly would recommend this wagon for toddlers and above. Linda b.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 16 month old granddaughter. She loves it and I like that it is sturdy and has seat belts.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Shows

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wagon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas 1.5 years ago and it has held up very well. Good design and very nicely built. Would highly recommend buying this wagon. It pulls nicely, glides smoothly and kids love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I am not giving a five star ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am not giving a five star on this is because the directions were her Awful they were so hard to follow. There were hardly any words just pictures and the pictures didn't even help it took me over an hour to get this thing together once it was together though it was worth the effort
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Alleva

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and for the price, its a solid wagon. I would say its a bit small so more for younger kiddos. She is three and is tall for her age so she won't fit much longer but we do have a little boy on the way so when he gets a little older, he will use it but it doesn't look like they will both fit but I'm sure she will want to pull him around all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: Smooth riding.
customer_reviews.text: I think every toddler mom should have one. Last for years
customer_reviews.author: robbie miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Replaced previous one. Love it, works great for tranporting kids to and from beach, decent on the sand even though not intended use. Only issue was directions to put together were confusing, missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kilosh

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your kid!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon for my kiddos. We have owned this for years and buy one for almost every child we know when they turn 1. Kids enjoy opening the door and hiding things in the small compartment under the seat. It pulls fairly easily and it is extremely durable. Ours is very well loved!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in the way it came with no help to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a nightmare to put together, the directions were not in English and could not be understood. We had to guess our way through it. I was very disappointed in the way it came with no help to get it right. It took us forever to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: alma arpey

customer_reviews.title: Good wagon
customer_reviews.text: Nice wagon. My son loves it! It was easy to put together. I can’t fit it in my trunk though.
customer_reviews.author: Cassieandra102

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this wagon and so do my kids! Some of the reviews said it was noisy but it wasn't bothersome. It sounds just like my toddlers plastic tricycle. My kids really enjoy walks in this wagon. its very spacious for them and I have fit it in the back of my crossover SUV to take the zoo with us.
customer_reviews.author: Janessa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Well Built Wagon
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy wagon that my toddler loves. I'm sure he will be using it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 young grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wagon to "walk" our 30 month old granddaughter and her 9 month old sister around the block.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. King

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about purchasing from this company since I'm used to buying from Little Tyke's, but the quality of this wagon is awesome! The way it's made would be nearly impossible for your child to pinch his/her fingers anywhere. It's solid and easy to put together. I'm VERY happy with my purchase and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: Directions?
customer_reviews.text: Pretty durable, assembly direction are a joke, can pretty much assemble it from pictures and large picture on carton
customer_reviews.author: tom walket

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so excited to get this wagon. Unfortunately all the hardware was missing. I was unable to watch her enjoy her present. (She lives out of state).
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this wagon! Love to ride in it continuously. It’s been very enjoyable! It’s well built, very sturdy. Great price for the quality. The only flaw is that it will tip back if you are not holding the handle at the right angle when pulling. It hasn’t tipped all the way back. But, don’t know if you were have only one child, over a certain weight, in the back of the wagon, if it would tip all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wagon ever !!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old grandson absolutely loves this wagon, sturdy and fun !
customer_reviews.author: Lala Sears

customer_reviews.title: Cute wagon
customer_reviews.text: The directions were not the best, however, I was able to assemble the wagon in 20 minutes. I like that the wagon has straps to keep the child in place.
customer_reviews.author: GradNurse2010

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 3 and loves this wagon. We initially used it in the house to pull stuffed animals around but it has been carted off to the park and pulled through dirt. I have a mid-size SUV and this takes up most of the back. My daughter cannot get this in the back of her Nissan Juke without putting down one of her seats. Love this wagon though and we'll worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy safe wagon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy that I would highly recommend. I bought it for my granddaughter's 2nd birthday, and she immediately got in and sat down. She loved the door, and it got a good workout that day. It's sturdy, as I would expect from Little Tykes, and a wagon is a great thing to have. I also bought her the Lil Wagon, and she has been pulling around her stuffed animals ever since. Was easy to put together (takes about a half hour), and will provide years of use for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Estee

customer_reviews.title: The seat cracked quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one-year old twin granddaughters. Initially it was great, but after only a month the seat was cracked. I am referring to the seat that cover the little storage area. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Great Wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy wagon. Bought one several years ago for two of my grandsons and they can both still ride in it at 3 and 6. I just purchased another wagon for my 1 year old grandson and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Yay we now have our 1st wagon! now we just need a lil one to pop inside of it.
customer_reviews.text: The wagon arrived to my house a week earlier than expected that was nice. My husband and I put it together It wasn't hard it probably took about 35 40 minutes. only issue we had putting it together was that a washer was A-Wall. So we had to make a trip to the local hardware store to buy a new washer. The wagon it's self Appears to be sturdy I don't see any problem with this being something that we will have in our family for years to come and make many memories with.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Grand child will not ride in his stroller any more just want to ride in the wagon.
customer_reviews.author: New Viking Fan

customer_reviews.title: It ok
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble. My daughter loves it and I like that it has s cup holder ,as well as a little storage area. I feel that the maneuvering is stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Calia

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with twin toddlers just got easier.
customer_reviews.text: Lugging two toddlers around is tough. This wagon made it a whole lot easier!! Durable to withstand pulling it along fields, roads, and dirt. My wife uses it everyday to wheel the twins into daycare. Also makes Halloween walking a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, roomy wagon
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, roomy wagon, with a small storage compartment, 2 cup holders, and a door, which my granddaughter loves to open and close (it can be secured when she is actually riding in the wagon). It is reasonably easy to assemble. However, directions should include the suggestion that, when trying to tap on the wheel caps on a softer surface like a rug, use a block of wood under the tool they supply.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wood

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon for walks about the neighborhood and to the park. Unless your trunk is big enough to fit this bad boy in, it’s not really one that’s easy to take on trips. We ordered a collapsible one for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Wheel snapped off within 3 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: It was given to a close friend for her twin's first birthday, but hasn't made it through three months of sporadic use. The wheel snapped off it's axel and now she has to call for replacement parts (and hope they have them) in order to be able to use it. I received a Step2 pushcar for my son and was very happen since it has held up well with daily use over the last 6 months. The wagon, however, was a let down.
customer_reviews.author: EngProf AvidRead

customer_reviews.title: Love this wagon!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this wagon for my one and a half year old daughter and she really loves it! I love that it has a compartment under one of the seats to store snacks or anything else we might need for a longer trip. She does end up sitting down where your feet are supposed to go, but that is not a problem for us. We are excited to try this out next summer after our second daughter will be born, there is plenty of room for two!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids.
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is super. My two grandsons loved to play in it even if they weren't going out with it. Fit 3 nicely Nicely made. Maneuvers well
customer_reviews.author: PrincessJulia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect wagon for 1 kid and her turtle or 2 kids. Stop scrolling and just add to cart.
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Great Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandsons first birthday. Sturdy and roomy. Easy for my husband to put together. I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love it. It is exactly what I was wanting and looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Speters

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wagaon as a gift for my granddaughter and then I ordered a 2nd one to have at my home for when she is here. She is one years old and loves the wagon. Instructions are clear. It has a lot of nice features and seems to be durable. No negatives in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby purchase yet!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, exactly as described. My granddaughter LOVES this wagon! Grandma does as well because it's easier than a stroller (can throw the diaper bag, purse, and whatever else) in with her, and it's very light to get in and out of the car. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jdix

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good wagon
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good wagon. It was great for the price. I was really wanting one with seat belts so in that sense it was perfect. One of the wheels was damaged on arrival it still works but that was unsettling since it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Bogus

customer_reviews.title: great little cart
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece and nephew. They said they love it and looks very nice. They look forward to using it for a long time, I'm sure the kids will love being pulled around in it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Z.

customer_reviews.title: Quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: As advertised built well and made 1 1/2 year old little boy very happy
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Shoults

customer_reviews.title: how many washers went
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The only thing I wish was different, is that they used bolts to secure the wheels. That way if you didn't realize how many washers needed to be put between this and that, you could fix it. Also if the current tap on nuts fall off, good luck fixing it. It is p[ossible but a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: It's a good toy that will last and a helpful for their parents on day trips to the zoo or amusement park
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Glass

customer_reviews.title: Wagons Go the Distance
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is a good size, but we wanted one that would fit a couple of kids. It's getting a lot of use out in the yard with a busy little one. I like yard wagons as gifts for kids because they come in handy for lots of things. The kids grow, but the wagons last for years doing various jobs around the house and yard. I still have my sons', and he's 25!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hoopis

customer_reviews.title: Cute durable wagon
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together, but doable. My two old loves it, especially the seats that let up to store his small toys.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wagon. Perfect for pulling toddler. Seat belts are a plus. Wheels are loud on the road as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: easy to clean, kids love it, wheels work well. It could use seat belts
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

product_meta.title: Step2 Wagon for Two Plus Blue
product_meta.description: The Wagon for Two Plus is an innovative children’s wagon in fresh natural colors. It includes an easy-latch door that opens to two contoured seats and deepleg well with molded-in drain holes. It has a long handle for easy pulling that folds under the wagon for easy transport and storage, two safety seat belts and a Tag-Along Trailer Plus that attaches for extra storage (sold separately).
feature_bullets: Easy-latch door opens to two contoured seats and deep leg well with molded-in drain holes
Has a long handle for easy pulling that folds under the wagon for easy transport and storage
Two safety seat belts included. Maximum weight in wagon: 75 Pounds.(33.75kg). Recommended Age - 1.5 and up
Tag-Along Trailer Plus attaches for extra storage (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,103 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
